column5: Biologist Zeb Hogan travels the world studying fish as large as 200 kilograms.  just watched a guy take a shark by hand.no line, just his hands....noodling for sharks.extreme !!!!!!
That was a good show. The Snakehead invasion segment was a little disturbing however. We're worried about Asian Carp but the these Snakeheads and Giant Snakeheads are big time predetors.
